text:
e="preserve">Summer Yasmine Bishil (born July 17, 1988) is an American actress. She became well known for her roles as Jasira in the 2007 movie "Towelhead" and as Taslima in the 2009 movie "Crossing Over". She is also known for her role as Margo Hanson on the Syfy fantasy drama series "The Magicians".
Bishil was born in Pasadena, California.
